document_data.name: ''Swailing Blade''
document_data.mainbody: e long, curved scimitar visibly glowed with heat, exuding small flames.
document_data.Description: The long, curved scimitar visibly glowed with heat, exuding small flames.
document_data.Powers: The ''swailing blade'' burned and incinerated those it struck with varying degrees of ferocity. It also passively improved the firepower of magical flames produced by the wielder.
document_data.History: The blade was recovered from the stash of the [[druid]] [[Halsaime]] after he was defeated within the [[Druid's Deep]] of Thorngap.
